paper_abstract: We give some reductions among problems in (nonnegative) weighted #CSP which restrict the class of functions that needs to be considered in computational complexity studies. Our reductions can be applied to both exact and approximate computation. In particular, we show that the recent dichotomy for unweighted #CSP can be extended to rational-weighted #CSP. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The complexity of weighted and unweighted #CSP
